about_the_game:
Scoot is the most advanced scooter game ever made. With it's simcade physics, Scoot is satisfying, realistic, and accessible to everyone. Scooter riding gamers can rest easy now that their 10+ year long dream has finally been fulfilled.

Physics
Scoot's physics allows players to play however they want. Whether you're trying to gap a set of stairs, or do an insane trick over a mega ramp. You can do it all.

World
New Carven is the place to be if you've got a love for grinding ledges and getting technical. Plenty of street spots await you in this rider-friendly city. Street riding not really your thing? No problem! Jumbo Jump Island is a park from paradise. Hit the insane downhill course or see if you can make it all the way down the looping tunnel. Scoot offers a place for any style of riding.

Online Multiplayer
Feeling lonely? Or simply want to show off your skills? Head into Scoot's online mode and shred with up to 4 other players from around the world. If you'd prefer to just play with friends with no interruption, then that's not a problem. Scoot's online mode allows you to play in both public and private lobbies.

Park Builder
Big bowls, endless rails, long jumps. Scoot allows you to experience the skatepark you've always wanted with the in-game park builder. Pick from a large array of different elements and place them in whatever arrangement you please. The best part? You can share parks you've created with the community in our discord! Presenting players with endless different parks to ride.

More Notable Features
• Replay Editor
• Advanced on-foot navigation
• Parkour
• Extensive customisation
• Triple-A level ragdoll physics
• In-game challenges

short_description: Scoot is the long awaited scooter riding game that riders have been waiting years for. Enter this physics based game and perform over 40 different tricks, customise your scooter and rider, build your dream park, film clips, or play online with friends!
